alfredsnippet.snippet:
(cont'd)

"The third perspective is to say that the aether is 'that which fills space devoid of matter', 'that' being a sea of energy, the deployment and reorganization of which accounts for the creation of matter and then go on to supplement that with the second definition."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Harold Aspden Defines Aether - Part 2
